BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: Monson Home for Aged People Inc

SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: Our building and grounds are leased to the Monson Senior Center for 100 per year They provide services to the seniors and disabled people of the Town of Monso
